JobTitle: Group Product Manager - Head of Uber Merchant Growth
JobFullDesc: About the RoleAs a Head of Uber Merchant Growth, you'll play a key leadership role in engaging and retaining our merchants over time. With a diverse user base across the globe, our goal is to develop capabilities to help grow demand for the Merchants that help UberEats fit into.What You'll DoWhat stops merchants from remaining engaged on an ongoing basis with Uber Eats? How can we ensure that Uber Eats is a merchant’s first choice of food delivery platform? How might merchants want to engage with Uber Eats members? How can we build long-term platform loyalty with our merchants? These are the sorts of questions you'll be responsible for answering. As the product manager for this team, you'll work with Engineering, Data Science, Design, and cross-organizational counterparts to transform your strategy into a membership product scaled across the globe. This involves considering local customer needs, cultural nuance, financials, and competitive environments to help our business grow and retain its loyal user base.Basic QualificationsMinimum 7 years of product management experience delivering highly successful and innovative products with your fingerprints all over them -- and you're deeply proud of what you've accomplished.Prior experience managing robust teams, setting and delivering on a strategy you crafted, where you were accountable for the outcomes.Preferred QualificationsYou find a way to get the data you need and whip it into an insightful story with no help.
